docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, Oct. 24 -- The new Chilean Foreign Minister, Joaquin Fernandez y Fernandez, arrived here tonight from Montevideo, Uruguay, en route to Santiago, Chile, toward which he will continue his journey early tomorrow morning by air.

docs.snippet: According to reports received from Havana last week, David Joffo's recent presentation of imperforate sheets of Cuba's 1942 "For Democracy" series to President Roosevelt has created within Cuban philatelic ranks a demand for an official inquiry into...
docs.lead_paragraph: According to reports received from Havana last week, David Joffo's recent presentation of imperforate sheets of Cuba's 1942 "For Democracy" series to President Roosevelt has created within Cuban philatelic ranks a demand for an official inquiry into the circumstances attending the printing of the stamps in imperforate condition.
docs.abstract: Cuban Govt gift of imperforate For Democracy series feared likely to cause price boom

headline.main: Cubans Demand Stamp Inquiry; They Want to Know More About Imperforates That Roosevelt Received

docs.snippet: Jose de Aguirre, president of the Basque Republic until Generalissimo Francisco Franco's forces conquered that territory, declared yesterday that the United States must adopt a stiffer attitude toward Petain and Franco if it wishes to win the support...
docs.lead_paragraph: Jose de Aguirre, president of the Basque Republic until Generalissimo Francisco Franco's forces conquered that territory, declared yesterday that the United States must adopt a stiffer attitude toward Petain and Franco if it wishes to win the support of the common people in South America.

docs.snippet: LONDON, Oct. 27 -- The stock markets were busy again today after yesterday's big turnover. The South American rails and the home industrials were particularly active.
